name: Not Dying Today
description: Not dying today is a 2D side-scrolling action game. In 2030, the world has been taken over by zombies. With fire and blade, bullets and guns, you, captain Aiden, will do anything to protect the last human kind, anything, even turn into a zombie, using zombie power to kill zombies.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia 320M or higher, or Radeon 7000 or higher, or Intel HD 3000 or higher Storage: 500 MB available space
